## Conversion.Converter.mapConvertItems() method

Creates a [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) which maps the individual items of a collection resulting from this [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) using the supplied [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
mapConvertItems<TI>(mapConverter: Converter<TI, unknown>): Converter<TI[], TC>;
```

mapConverter


</td><td>

[Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md)<!-- -->&lt;TI, unknown&gt;


</td><td>

The [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) to be applied to each element of the result of this [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md)<!-- -->&lt;TI\[\], TC&gt;

A new [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) returning `<TI[]>`<!-- -->.

## Remarks

Fails if `from` is not an array.
